snippet.title: Desperados III - Money for the Vultures Part 1 Trailer
snippet.description:
Desperados III - Money for the Vultures Part 1: Late to the Party is OUT NOW.

Included in the Season Pass, the new mission takes place well after the events of Desperados III, and brings Cooper and the gang back together to hunt down Vincent DeVitt's hidden riches. Help them uncover a mysterious vault, avoid bloodthirsty looters, and find out if the enigmatic Rosie from Baton Rouge can really be trusted, or if she has her own interests at heart.

The first chapter of Money for the Vultures has an estimated playtime of 90 - 120 minutes on average. 
---
Website: http://desperadosgame.com
Discord: http://discord.gg/desperados
Steam: http://n.thq.com/1iyB30lAeDg

#Desperados #THQNordic
